hero.title: Web Development Barcelona - Websites That Multiply Your Customers
hero.subtitle: I'm Ignacio, web developer specialized in Barcelona companies. In 5 years I've helped 50+ Barcelona businesses multiply their online leads. My approach: create websites that work 24/7 to generate real customers while you focus on your business.
hero.localSEO: My specialty is understanding your business and your audience. I work with companies across all sectors and locations, creating personalized web strategies that connect with your ideal customers. Whatever your market, I know how to make them find you first.

features.title: Why 50+ Barcelona Companies Choose My Web Development Approach
features.description: My specialty is Barcelona companies. I've spent 5 years understanding the local market, analyzing what works and what doesn't. My advantage: I know perfectly what your potential customers are looking for and how to make them find you first.

items.title: Ultra-Fast Websites That Google Loves
items.description: Did you know 53% of users abandon websites that take longer than 3 seconds? I build sites that load in under 2 seconds. Result: more people stay, Google ranks you higher, and your competition wonders what you're doing right.

items.title: Strategic Design That Maximizes Conversions
items.description: I don't make 'pretty designs'. Every button, every color, every word is strategically placed to guide your visitors toward ONE action: contacting you. Average result for my clients: +40% more conversions in the first 3 months.

items.title: Local SEO Barcelona With Measurable Results
items.description: When someone searches 'your service + Barcelona' on Google, do you appear? My clients do. I optimize your website for local searches from day 1. I don't promise miracles, but I do deliver results: 80% of my clients improve their Google position in under 3 months.

items.title: Ongoing Support That Actually Helps You
items.description: My commitment goes beyond delivery. I explain everything in simple English, provide understandable manuals, and answer your questions the same day. Some clients have been with me for 4 years because they value continuous support.

projects.title: Website Solutions That Fit Your Business Goals
projects.description: Every business is unique, so your website should be too. I create custom solutions that match your specific needs, goals, and budget.

personal.title: Professional Portfolio & Personal Brand Sites
personal.description: Stand out from the competition with a website that showcases your expertise and attracts your ideal clients. Perfect for consultants, freelancers, and service professionals.
features: Custom design that reflects your personal brand
Contact forms that actually get responses

business.title: Corporate & Business Websites Barcelona
business.description: Specialized in websites for Barcelona companies of all sizes. Your website will work 24/7 to attract local and global customers, grow your business in Barcelona and expand your digital presence.
features: Strategic design focused on corporate conversions
Local SEO Barcelona optimization for better visibility
Service pages optimized for local and global searches
Analytics setup to track corporate success

digital.title: E-commerce & Advanced Web Solutions
digital.description: Take your business to the next level with a powerful online store or custom web application. Built for growth, security, and seamless user experience.

process.title: How I Turn Your Vision Into A Website That Works
process.description: No surprises, no confusion. Here's exactly how I'll bring your website to life, step by step.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy Session
steps.description: We'll dive deep into your business goals, target audience, and competitive landscape. I'll create a clear roadmap for your website that aligns with your growth objectives.

steps.title: Custom Design & User Experience
steps.description: I'll create wireframes and visual designs that not only look amazing but are strategically designed to guide visitors toward taking action. Every element serves a purpose.

steps.title: Development & Quality Testing
steps.description: Using modern technologies and best practices, I'll build your website to be fast, secure, and scalable. Rigorous testing ensures everything works perfectly across all devices.

steps.title: Launch & Growth Support
steps.description: Your website goes live with full training, clear documentation, and ongoing support. I'll help you understand how to use and grow your new digital asset.

testimonials.title: What Happens When Your Website Actually Works
testimonials.description: These are real Barcelona companies that decided to stop losing customers online:

items.text: Before I had a website that looked like it was from 2010. Clients found me through recommendations, but online I was invisible. Ignacio made me a website that in 3 months has brought me 15 new interior design projects. Now I appear first when people search 'interior designer Barcelona'. Worth every euro.

items.text: My old website embarrassed me to show it. Clients hired me through LinkedIn, but online I didn't exist. Ignacio positioned me as THE digitalization consultant in Barcelona. Now I have a 2-month waiting list. My rate has increased 60% because now it's clear I'm a serious professional.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing, No Hidden Surprises
pricing.description: Choose the package that fits your needs and budget. All projects include hosting setup, basic SEO, and post-launch support.
pricing.note: Every project is unique. Contact me for a personalized quote based on your specific requirements and goals.

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.description: Get clear answers to the most common questions about working with me and the website development process.

items.question: How long does it take to build a professional website?
items.answer: Timeline depends on complexity and scope. A simple business website typically takes 2-3 weeks, while a full e-commerce site can take 6-8 weeks. I'll give you a detailed timeline after our discovery call, and I always keep you updated on progress.

items.question: What do you need from me to get started?
items.answer: I'll need your content (text, images, brand assets), access to your domain and hosting (if you have them), and your input on design preferences. Don't worry if you don't have everything readyâ€”I'll guide you through the entire process.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after the website launches?
items.answer: Absolutely! Every project includes post-launch support, and I offer ongoing maintenance packages for regular updates, security monitoring, and technical support. Your website is an investment, and I help protect it.

items.question: Will my website work on mobile devices?
items.answer: Yes, every website I build is mobile-first and responsive. With over 60% of web traffic coming from mobile devices, I ensure your site looks and works perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

items.question: Can you help improve my existing website instead of building a new one?
items.answer: Definitely! I can audit your current site and recommend improvements, whether that's a complete redesign, performance optimization, SEO improvements, or adding new functionality. We'll find the most cost-effective solution for your needs.
